abstract: Rio Tinto says it has obtained the acceptance of 49.49 percent of Riversdale Mining shares, and will extend its tender offer to April 20.
snippet: Rio Tinto says it has obtained the acceptance of 49.49 percent of Riversdale Mining shares, and will extend its tender offer to April 20.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto said on Wednesday that its tender offer had obtained the acceptance of 49.49 percent of Riversdale Mining shares and would be extended by two weeks.

headline.main: Rio Tender Offer Exceeds Its Goal and Gets Extended
